remarks: Lemma for ~ emcl .  The function ` H ` is the difference between ` F ` and ` G ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)
statement:
emcl.1 $e |- F = ( n e. NN |-> ( sum_ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ( 1 / m ) - ( log ` n ) ) ) $.
emcl.2 $e |- G = ( n e. NN |-> ( sum_ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ( 1 / m ) - ( log ` ( n + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
emcl.3 $e |- H = ( n e. NN |-> ( log ` ( 1 + ( 1 / n ) ) ) ) $.
emcllem3 $p |- ( N e. NN -> ( H ` N ) = ( ( F ` N ) - ( G ` N ) ) ) $.
$d H m $.
$d N m n $.
$d m n $.
